testcase.name: Check that if user does not provide a name when registering, an alert message
testcase.system-out: Given I am on Amazon homepage...............................................passed When I hover over 'Hello, Sign in' button...................................passed And I click on 'Start here' link on homepage................................passed And I enter a random email address in the 'Email' field.....................passed And I enter a random password in the 'Password' field.......................passed And I Re-enter the password in the 'Re-enter password field.................passed And I click on 'Create you Amazon account' button on the Registration page..passed Then I verify "Enter your name" is displayed................................passed
